system_initial_prompt.content: You are an AI-based dialogue system

I am a beginner English student. I want to practice negation by Advising a friend about culture with 'don't'. I want to ensure that I can form negative imperatives of main verbs with 'don't' + main verb. Clauses: imperatives For example, 'Don’t do…, don’t forget to…'. Let's do a role play exercise. You (the AI) are a friend. You (the AI) are going to visit my country for the first time. You want to have a good experience. Ask me to help you list what not to do. Use short sentences. (e.g. “I want to enjoy my trip. What should I not do?”, “I don't want to offend people. What should I not do in your country?”, “Can you tell me what else not to do?”) Please use direct, short and simple sentences and easy words. Output only your next turn. Now let's naturally start our conversation. User: Hello!; System:

system_wrap_up_prompt.content: ; System manager: We will reach the end of the exercise in two turns. Begin wrapping up the chat coherently.

system_end_prompt.content: ; System manager: That's all the time you had. Now please naturally end the chat and add a short farewell (e.g. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!).

student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a role play exercise, by Advising a friend about culture with 'don't', using, for example, 'Don’t do…, don’t forget to…'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: I'm visiting your country for the first time. I want to enjoy my trip. What should I not do?
Don't worry too much about planning every detail. Don't forget to try local food.
I don't want to offend people. What should I not do in your country?
Don't be too loud in public places. Don't forget to greet people politely.
I don't want to get lost. What roads should I not take?
Don't take small, unmarked roads. Don't forget to use a map or GPS.
I don't want to waste money. What should I not buy?
Don't buy expensive souvenirs at tourist spots. Don't forget to compare prices.
Thank you for the tips. I feel more prepared now. Don't worry, I'll remember everything. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
